manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Helps to fight razor bumps and reduce the occurrence of ingrown hairs. Translucent formula lets you see where you want to shave. Helps soften hair for maximum glide. Suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slime over lather
reviews.reviewText: I actually stumbled across this shave butter by accident as I had been using another manufacturer shave butter, and was very pleased with it, but ended up buying this as a one off. Though the package says it’s a shave butter, its consistency and appearance is more of a clear slime. Don’t be discouraged by this, in my opinion, it’s actually a much better shave. Years ago I used a shave gel made to wet shave in the shower, that was just a slime that wouldn’t lather up. It was the best shave of my life. The dollar shave club shave butter is the closest to that experience I’ve come since. The clear slime offers less material to clog up the razor and allows the razor to glide smoothly over the hair without matting it down. My recommendation is periodically splashing water on your face to keep it from drying up during the shave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I don't like their razors, but maaaaaan the shave butter (and post shave cream) are awesome. The razor glides across my skin with this stuff, it's amazing.For what it's worth: I shave my torso, face and head. I usually use a less expensive foam on my torso and shave my face and head with the shave butter, since both are more prone to razor burn. My head especially feels great when I use this stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better Than the European-sounding Competitor's Shave Butter
reviews.reviewText: Thinner out of the tube than my previous shave butter, yet it provides more defense against nicks and is more moisturizing despite my tendency to hit most areas 2 or 3 times from different bangles. I do not have to use quite as much for the first application and no longer have to reapply which was not uncommon with other brands I have tried. It has a slightly medicated aroma that some might find displeasing. I prefer it to a more tropical scent of one of the brands I have tried. I give it 5 stars. The slightly thinner feel also works better with my electric razor when I feel like skipping the blade that day. Never had success with an electric until I found this shave butter because electric shavers rub my face raw. This product has changed my routine since I can mix it up & not have to use a blade every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does what it says it does
reviews.reviewText: Not for nothing but this shave gel does exactly what it’s supposed to be doing. The best part about it and only reason I tried it was because it’s clear so I’m still able to see the lines I’m trying to shave so I don’t make as many mistakes and it’s so beneficial to have a gel work on my sensitive skin I don’t usually let anything new touch my face. But this is it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best shave I've ever had
reviews.reviewText: I've been shaving for 55+ years and this is the product I've always wanted. The product is translucent on the skin and beard so it's easy to maintain a clean, neat line to the beard. The razor glides with no drag at all and provides the closest shave I've ever had. That being said it doesn't rinse quite as easily from the razor as other products I've used but that's not really a problem. I recommend this DSC shave butter very highly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shave butter
reviews.reviewText: I was once a user of canned shave cream until discovering those ingredients are not healthful to my face. I heard shave butter was much better for my skin. Have not used canned shave cream for many years now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best shave ever
reviews.reviewText: I can't rave about this product enough. I have been using it for 3 years and I shave arms (tats), face and head. This is the best shave cream I have ever used and I have been shaving for 48 years. I don't care what kind of razor you use you will not get a better, smoother, closer, cleaner, shave. It also softens up your skin and the thick patch at the edge of my neck and face is smooth as a baby's behind. Would give it 6 stars if I could...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I used to use Dollar Shave Club products for years. They were affordable and effective. Unfortunately, since the company was sold, the quality of their products has suffered. The gel is not as thick or slick as the original formula. You also won't get as good of a shave. The only thing that's a plus is that it's still translucent which allows you to shave and shape your beard line. I would not recommend this or any Dollar Shave products anymore.
